description:
build a MongoDB collection for storing car details.

each document in the collection includes:

  1. License Number (12-345-67 etc.)
  2. Manufacturer (Toyota etc.)
  3. Model (Corola etc.)
  4. Year (2018 etc.)
  5. KM (10000 etc.)
  6. Price (120000 etc.)

build an application (with both client and server) which allows:

  1. adding a car
  2. display car details by license number
  3. display cars details by year range
  4. display cars models by manufacturer
  5. display cars models and prices by model
  6. receive two license numbers and display the car which is more expensive
